DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. RELIGION NOTES / DAYE CLARK
DOC.TEXT: William B . Hemenway will be installed as senior pastor at Christ Lutheran_Church in Costa Mesa on Sunday at 4 p.m. He served as senior pastor for 19 years at Christ the King Church in Coeur d ' Alene , Idaho . A reception will follow the service at the church , 760 Victoria St . Information : ( 714 ) 631-1611 .
